name: Bird Game (itch) (Hazanoid)
description:
It's Bird Game! A completely original game now featuring a title screen, the ability to exit the game, and your favourite sound bites such as "ButtonClick1", "BirdFlap", and "BirdDeath".

Space to jump (probably would have made more sense for it to be mouse click to jump but here we are).

(My first ever project so don't expect anything good)
